ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:44:42 [Issue ID 4000-117680] urn:comicvine:4000-117680 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 18:44:45. [Issue ID 1028924]
ComicInfo.Summary: Mike Deodato, fan-favorite superstar action and "babe" artist for everything from Batman to Xena, blazes into his thrilling third action-packed issue! As the beautiful Asian assassin Jade Warriors and their daring defector Deathkiss draw swords and battle to the death, the demonic dragon lords return. The lovely Deathkiss is bound for destruction! PLUS: The naive American Jade Warrior known as Onyx has been miraculously "blessed" to carry a dragon child and only now realizes what a bitter victory her achievement will become. "The Blood of the Children" is a Christmas story unlike any other -- it will keep fans talking and the internet buzzing for months to come NOTE: This special issue will ship with THREE different covers in equal quantities: 1.) An Al Rio art cover; 2.) A photo cover starring "Exotica" model Lisa Wills; and 3.) a painted movie poster-style cover by Star Wars painter Monte Moore!
ComicInfo.Title: Dragons Rising
ComicInfo.Inker: Mike Deodato Jr.,Emir Ribeiro,Mike Deodato,Emir Ribeiro,Mike Deodato
